articles.title: ASX improves to flat; Oil Search up 6.7% after rejecting Santos offer - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The S&P/ASX 200 dropped more than 1% at the open, but began easing losses after the first hour. Materials and energy were under-performing, while healthcare, tech, and consumer discretionary stocks rose.
